meanings.definition: A person who practices iridology, the study of the iris of the eye to diagnose health issues.
meanings.sent1: The iridologist examined my eye to determine if I had any health problems.
meanings.sent2: I went to see the iridologist to learn more about my health through my eye's iris.
meanings.sent3: The iridologist joked that my eye color revealed my love for chocolate.
meanings.sent4: The iridologist's insights were like reading a book written in the language of the iris.
meanings.sent5: After visiting the iridologist, I couldn't stop thinking about the intricate details of my iris.
